My Projects

SoftServe.io

SoftServe is a sales-productivity app that I built that is fully integrated with SalesForce. The app has over 60 current users and is my largest project to date.

Languages/Libraries:
  • Javascript
  • Node
  • mongoDB
  • JSForce

Check it out
Readability Rater

I created the readiblity-rater to be part of my sales productivtity app, SoftServe, to help sales people write simpler, more reader friendly emails. It uses the Flesch readability formula and gives the user a breakdown of their text. It is still in it's most basic iteration of design.

Languages/Libraries:
  • Javascript

Check it out
Rock Paper Scissors

This is an console-based game of Rock Paper Scisors that allows the user to play the computer or another human, make wagers on the game and borrow money from the computer with interest.

Languages/Libraries:
  • Python 3

Check it out
Circles & Sounds

A project I built for a tech bootcamp assignment using 'Paper.js'. Use the letter keys of the keyboards to fill the screen with colorful circles and make sounds.

Languages/Libraries:
  • Javascript
  • Paper.js

Check it out
Guess That RGB

A JS project also built during my time studying in the bootcamp. It is a guessing game built to help with bette understanding RGB codes.

Languages/Libraries:
  • Javascript

Check it out
